name: SubmitDisputeEvidence
description:
Submit evidence to a cardholder's bank for a dispute.

This tool is used to submit evidence related to a dispute to the cardholder's bank. It includes evidence uploaded through specific Square endpoints and any automatically provided evidence. Evidence cannot be removed once submitted.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the dispute to which you are submitting evidence. You need this ID to ensure the evidence is attached to the correct dispute case.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to submit evidence.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to submit evidence.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to submit evidence.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
